title: BELLAMY, 8 CARAT LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE GOLD DROP EARRINGS
description:
SOLD AS A PAIR.
The Bellamy drop earrings are crafted with 8 carats of pear and round lab-grown white sapphires. Set in 14-karat gold-coated sterling silver with a 14-karat gold post. Pair with the Bea drop earrings for a graduated ear.
details:
Metal: 18k Gold Coated Sterling Silver
Setting: 4-prong
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Pear and round cut
Post: 14k solid gold



8 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
